metadata.title: CVE-2016-7051 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: XmlMapper in the Jackson XML dataformat component (akajackson-dataformat-xml) before 2.7.8 and 2.8.x before 2.8.4 allows remoteattackers to conduct server-side request forgery (SSRF) attacks via vectorsrelated to a DTD.

criterions.comment: jackson-dataformat-xml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
